named-query.name: UserRepository.findByLogin
named-query.query: select user from UserEntity user where user.login = :login

named-query.name: UserRepository.clearSecret
named-query.query: update UserEntity set secret = null where persistenceId = :userId

named-query.name: UserRepository.isSecretNotNull
named-query.query: select u.secret != null from UserEntity u where u.login = :login

named-query.name: UserRepository.updateAuthDate
named-query.query: update UserEntity set authDate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where persistenceId = :userId
